lead_paragraph: After the State Supreme Court last month blocked Gov. Terry McAuliffe’s blanket executive order, he is accomplishing his goal on a case-by-case basis.

headline.print_headline: 13,000 Felons Given Back Voting Rights in Virginia
headline.main: Virginia’s Governor Restores Voting Rights for 13,000 Ex-Felons

snippet: After the State Supreme Court last month blocked Gov. Terry McAuliffe’s blanket executive order, he is accomplishing his goal on a case-by-case basis....
abstract: Virginia Gov Terry McAuliffe says he has signed papers restoring voting rights of almost 13,000 ex-felons; effort was accomplished on case-by-case basis after Virginia Supreme Court issued July ruling prohibiting McAuliffe from doing so via single executive order.
